channel.title: Rune-Wizard Server
channel.description:
..:Information about Rune-Wizard:.. Rune-Wizard was started by 1337 pow3r,he made servers along time ago..he quit but came BACK!and wanted to introduce you guys to his new project it's ownage atm!Rune-Wizard was thought of when i watched 2 wizards(sara god and zammy god) battle.I was like hmm lol i miss making servers so now here i am.(Deltascape based)
+Updates+ -New home Lumbridge (83% done) - added ancient alter,lunar alter [working on banks,etc.]
-New quest(94% done) - might delete and make new one cuz kinda crappy.
-New monster teleports(50% done) - hills,dragons (might add more.)
-New smithing area (100% done) - anvils,furnace,ores.
-Shop npc's talk (100% done) - tells you what he/she sells.
-Remade shops (70% done) - coded most of shops not done though.
-Great Economony (50% done) - deletin the prices of items,adding more items,etc.
-Minigame teleports(22% done) - remaking godwars(my own version),added godwars to minigame teleport - deleting pest control adding new minigame with new reward.
-Deleting Void (0% done) - didn't do it yet lol not till im done with my minigame.
-Remaking Quests (12% done) - coded sheep shearer (made it where u give the guy a shear instead of 100 natures..)
-Seperating Shops(0% done) - i seperated em but i don't like where i placed em so working on that at the moment.
-Coding Jail (0% done) - it's just complicated i want to make my own lol.
-New Starter look (100% done)
-Wilderness Teleports(100% done) -now shows wilderness levels.
-Deleted PURE - MASTER command (100% done) - now admins must train.:P
-You can now repair Barrows for 30k (100% done) - part of my economony.
+Latest Updates+ NONE
+Updates Coming Soon+ What ever I Code lol.
+Pictures+ Starter look [IMG]http://i370.photobucket.com/albums/oo143/kyn_09/starter.jpg[/img] Wilderness Teleports [IMG]http://i370.photobucket.com/albums/oo143/kyn_09/wildy.jpg[/img] Minning area: [IMG]http://i370.photobucket.com/albums/oo143/kyn_09/lol.jpg[/img] Delete PURE - MASTER Command. [IMG]http://i370.photobucket.com/albums/oo143/kyn_09/chear.jpg[/img] [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2008, 08:04:05 pm[/size][hr]POST!
